name: the corpse
description:
Over the course of a year, Big Bag handed the corpse from one to another, leaving nothing but a folder of assets for the next person to use. We had little to no knowledge of what came before or what would come after. 

Our one rule was that we could only use the Mouse to control our corpse. The seams are there, and blood runs everywhere... 

the corpse is meant to be played more than once, but only as many times as it takes to reach the white light at the end.

RIP Rick Alex, you will not be missed. All hail funsworkings ! ! !
